paper_abstract: Emerging web services standards enable the development of large-scale applications in open environments. With the increasingly emerging web services, one of the main problems is not to find out the required services, but to select the optimum one from a set of requirements-satisfying services. In this paper, we propose a workflow-organization-model-based method to compute web services reputation values, then combine the reputation values with QoS-based objective quality values as the judgment standard to provide to users. Based on these values, users can select the optimum web service to execute.
paper_title: A method to select the optimum web services
